items.text: full and wide outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drive. Protection at wide long-off
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and the straight drive is stopped by Santner running to his left
items.postText: JackT: "@Terry Harpot Kusal Perera (bless his ability) didn't have scoreboard pressure on him in Durban, in an ODI chase, it's a bit more tricky"
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and the ball swings down the leg side for a wide
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 wide

items.preText: Tim: "@Shatu I wouldn't say that 10-11 overs at 13 runs an over is "easy", even with wickets in hand..."
items.text: short on off, and he does enough to slash a cut over the fielder at gully! That;s Bangladesh's 200
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: ramped! Wide outside off again, and the length ball is put away for four more. This time to the point boundary
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off stump, and defended straight back past the non-striker
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full and wide outside off, and he slashes a cover drive. Drops just short of Guptill at cover!
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: back of a length just outside off, and he plays a pulled shot onto the ground
items.postText: Graeme Ross Nee: "the Black Caps don't seem to have the strike power after those initial first few overs. it will be a real issue at the world cup "
items.shortText: Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.preText: Naim Noor Arnob: "Saifuddin and Mehidy's performances with the bat have solved Bangladesh's lower order crisis. Now they need the top order to show some form, the. Bangladesh will be up and running for the World Cup."
items.text: full just outside off, and he comes down the wicket to drive. Hits the bat's inside half and goes back to the bowler
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball on off, cramping Sabbir for room. Backs away and bunts a back-foot shot past the non-striker
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: drops short of Ferguson at point! Full and wide outside off, and Mehidy slices an attempted cover drive. Another change goes a-beggin'
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to the off side
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: slower through the air, full on off, and defended towards point
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he shovels a cover drive. Stopped by the fielder at cover, and he parries the ball to long-off
items.postText: Mohammad Isam: Reply to Naim Noor Arnob: "They have solved no crisis. Most bowling line-ups taper off after a good start and it is only natural for two batsmen in the lower or middle order to take advantage of it. There's nothing new to it. Saifuddin, Sabbir and some of the others have to bat well for a longer period of time (not during a match but during a series, season and year) to be convincing enough. It takes time to become a good international cricketer. An odd innings here or there doesn't really cut it at this level."
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run
Ferguson to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: length ball on leg, and going down the leg side again. Adding another run to the long list of wides that NZ have given this series
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: waist-high full toss, wide outside off, and steered to point. Surprised the batsman there, but the umpire believes that's a legal ball
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off stump, and the attempted cut is missed. Through to the keeper
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off stump again. Mistimes the cover drive to mid-off on this occasion
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he drills a straight drive down to long off
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: half-tracker on off, and he rocks back to pull along the ground to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and worked off his body to square leg for a quick single
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and driven to long off
items.shortText: Santner to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle, and worked off his hips to square leg
items.shortText: Santner to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run
